snippet: An off-season injury to Terrell Suggs had Baltimore worried, but Paul Kruger tallied nine regular-season sacks and has made decisive plays in their playoff wins.
abstract: Profile of Baltimore Ravens linebacker Paul Kruger, who has had a strong season after stepping in for the injured Terrell Suggs; Kruger is busy preparing with team for upcoming AFC championship game against New England Patriots.
lead_paragraph: An off-season injury to Terrell Suggs had Baltimore worried, but Paul Kruger tallied nine regular-season sacks and has made decisive plays in their playoff wins.

headline.seo: Kruger Leads Ravens’ Defense to A.F.C. Championship Game
headline.main: Given Chance, Raven Gets Into Backfield
headline.print_headline: Given Chance, Raven Gets Into Backfield
